message.body: Republican texted me back! You were right: Hey Sofie! I've been a little busy with some school applications and work but haven't forgot about that drink - how's your week looking?
John mouse murderer texted me back something decently nice as well-who knows
Men are busy-I guess their lives don't revolve around us.
Whaaaa u crazy. I love beyonce
Of course their lives revolve around us
U think I should text him baklck
Haha no he doesn't- he wrote something kind of dick on his fb about potentially hooking up w girls in the town he's in now for work so I'm never contacting him again
Wait what can we phone talk
Yeah! In sick and in bed all day so that's ideal
